title: Cant download LOL
body: I am having trouble downloading LOL, I can access to the download page but when i click on the download button after few seconds it says "Page can not be displayed" and when I click on the "Fix connection problems" it says" The DNS server isnt responding", is this what you guys are having or it is just simply my computer problem?

replies.body:
If its a DNS issue, try reconfiguring your DNS server to 8.8.8.8/8.8.4.4.
Google how to change your DNS server though, because I don't know what OS you are running.

He was only lvl 17, so young. 

It just seems to be on your computer, i suggest you contact riot's support if your still getting this :D

-GL
